item.title: ‘State planned to organise more Udyog Melas to eradicate unemployment’
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Minor Irrigation and Science and Technology N.S. Boseraju has said that the State government is working on eradicating unemployment by organising Udyog Mela (job fairs).
He was addressing the candidates after inaugurating a Udyog Mela on the second day of the three-day Raichur Zilla Utsav 2026, jointly organised by the District Administration, Zilla Panchayat, Skill Development Department, Karnataka State Rural Livelihood Development Organisation, and District Skill Mission at the ...]]>
item.author: Authors
